thread.section_title: Spa World Australia Pty Ltd Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Spa World Australia Pty Ltd | spaworld.com.au
thread.title: Garry Olson
thread.title_full: Spa World Australia Pty Ltd reviewed by Garry Olson

author: Garry Olson
title: Garry Olson
text: We got the Votex Spectrum from Gregory Hills. Fred sold us the spa the service was great. The spa was delivered and installed with no problems at all. We had a few questions about the spa controls since delivery and they have been extremely helpful every time. Lillian has been very helpful with some good tips for keeping the spa clean. I would recomend Spa World Gregory Hills to anyone as the service is great. They even talk to you after the sale is completed.
